p: The infrared and Raman spectra of the H 2L14 receptor and the CuL14, MnL14, and FeL14 complexes exhibited similar spectral patterns ( Figures S9–S12). Table 3 shows the assignments of the main bands related to coordination sites of the receptor (N–H ν, C=O ν, C=O ν of amide I and C=O δ from amide II) as well to coordinated water (H–O–H ν).
